attributes.action: Give the Elgin marbles back to their rightful owners - Greece
attributes.additional_details: The marbles will look much better in their natural surroundings and the special natural light which Greece has.
attributes.background: Parliament to debate and vote on repatriating the Elgin Marbles to their rightful place in the Acropolis Musium Athens. They were originally stolen by Lord Elgin.

rejection.details:
The repatriation of an item from the collection of the British Museum is a matter for the Trustees of the British Museum, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may want to sign this petition calling for a related action:

Allow the Trustees of the British Museum to accept repatriation requests: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550304
